name: Ravenous Hunger VR
description:
VR Game for the Vive

Feed the hungry person, but feeding them just makes them hungrier. It may snowball into starvation if you're not fast enough!

Made for the December 2016 UE4 Game Jam. The theme was "Snowball Effect"

Music by:

"Happy Happy Game Show" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
